snippet: The large margin of victory for the bill, which would ease small businesses’ access to investments, is a sign that the coming election is pressing Congress into action.
abstract: House of Representatives, in rare moment of cooperation spurred by the shadow of the November election, overwhelmingly approves legislation to ease small businesses’ access to investments and capital markets; Senate is set to unveil a largely similar version of the bill.
lead_paragraph: The large margin of victory for the bill, which would ease small businesses’ access to investments, is a sign that the coming election is pressing Congress into action.

headline.seo: House Passes JOBS Act by Large Margin
headline.main: With November in Mind, House Passes a Jobs Bill
headline.print_headline: With November in Mind, House Passes a Jobs Bill
